price: 89.Yalli moominiinih Qhiyaamah ayró weeqaytitte guba как gexxa Jannoota massoyse usun teetil waarak, toh kaxxa asallam kee maffaafa kinni.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
